translations: n.[车辆]自行车；脚踏车（bicycle 的复数）

phrs.translation: n. 气汞；自行车打气筒

sentences.sentence: "I started fixin' up ole bicycles fer poor kids."
sentences.translation: “我开始为穷孩子们修理旧自行车。”

sentences.sentence: Of the seven bicycles we had, only two were fit for the road.
sentences.translation: 我们的七辆自行车中，只有两辆适合这种路。
